Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Constructors
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    com.google.android.exoplayer2.source.hls.HlsMediaSource.Factory.createMediaSource(Uri, Handler, MediaSourceEventListener)
    Use HlsMediaSource.Factory.createMediaSource(Uri) and BaseMediaSource.addEventListener(Handler, MediaSourceEventListener) instead.
    com.google.android.exoplayer2.source.hls.HlsMediaSource.Factory.setMinLoadableRetryCount(int)
    Use HlsMediaSource.Factory.setLoadErrorHandlingPolicy(LoadErrorHandlingPolicy) instead.
  • Deprecated Constructors 
    Constructor and Description
    com.google.android.exoplayer2.source.hls.playlist.DefaultHlsPlaylistTracker(HlsDataSourceFactory, LoadErrorHandlingPolicy, ParsingLoadable.Parser<HlsPlaylist>)
    Use DefaultHlsPlaylistTracker.DefaultHlsPlaylistTracker(HlsDataSourceFactory, LoadErrorHandlingPolicy, HlsPlaylistParserFactory) instead. Using this constructor prevents support for attributes that are carried over from the master playlist to the media playlists.
    com.google.android.exoplayer2.source.hls.offline.HlsDownloadAction(Uri, boolean, byte[], List<StreamKey>)
    Use HlsDownloadAction.createDownloadAction(Uri, byte[], List) or HlsDownloadAction.createRemoveAction(Uri, byte[]).
    com.google.android.exoplayer2.source.hls.HlsMediaSource(Uri, DataSource.Factory, Handler, MediaSourceEventListener)
    Use HlsMediaSource.Factory instead.
    com.google.android.exoplayer2.source.hls.HlsMediaSource(Uri, DataSource.Factory, int, Handler, MediaSourceEventListener)
    Use HlsMediaSource.Factory instead.
    com.google.android.exoplayer2.source.hls.HlsMediaSource(Uri, HlsDataSourceFactory, HlsExtractorFactory, int, Handler, MediaSourceEventListener, ParsingLoadable.Parser<HlsPlaylist>)
    Use HlsMediaSource.Factory instead.
